templates.name: News Article
templates.description: Template for news articles and announcements
templates.cssStyles: .news-article { max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto; } .news-title { color: #2c3e50; font-size: 2rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; } .news-summary { font-weight: 600; color: #7f8c8d; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; } .news-content { line-height: 1.6; } .news-meta { margin-top: 2rem; padding-top: 1rem; border-top: 1px solid #ecf0f1; color: #95a5a6; }

templates.name: Event Announcement
templates.description: Template for event announcements and invitations
templates.htmlStructure:
{{title}}

{{date}}{{time}}
{{location}}
{{description}}
templates.cssStyles: .event-announcement { max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto; } .event-title { color: #e74c3c; font-size: 2rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; } .event-details { background: #f8f9fa; padding: 1.5rem; border-radius: 8px; margin: 1.5rem 0; } .event-datetime { display: flex; gap: 1rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; } .event-date { font-weight: 600; color: #2c3e50; } .event-time { color: #7f8c8d; } .event-location { font-weight: 600; color: #27ae60; } .event-description { line-height: 1.6; }
